title: Twin Shadows is the most viable item for Adcs in this game.

embed.description: Twin Shadows is a legendary item in League of Legends. Statistical Value

body:
Alright guys, I'm here for a civil discussion and I don't wish to have any flame, because this is serious and I want to make the awesome community aware of this, since little know.

Let us start with a look at the stats;
*80 ability power = 1740g
10% cooldown reduction = 317g
6% movement speed = 357g
Total Gold Value = 2414g

Twin Shadows is 100.6% gold efficient without its active.*

Now, that may seem like a lot of AP! and to be fair, it is, but so many adcs actually synergize with this reasonable amount of AP and it can, wait for it, make them better!

Adcs are ranged.
They do damage.
They like to kite and hit things, while not letting the enemy hit them.

That is what they do, this item makes them practically invincible!
It has 10% cooldown reduction, so your flash will only be 270 seconds instead of 300, allowing you to flash more and be slippery like an Irelia with Qss!
It has 6% movement speed, which is an absurd amount for an adc item. I mean, they are already hard to hit and catch because they're ranged, but when this item itself has an active **that also slows the *ENEMY?***, that my friends is the real kicker.

The only downside is the Ap. Or is it?! lets take a look at the ~~adc~~ Marksman page in the client.
http://vvcap.net/db/kKFSyX5261PJzlEbFOXC.htp

Now, of all the champions shown here, lets count how many have AP Ratios in their kit.
13! 13 out of 19! That's full blown ridiculous if you ask me.

I'm sorry for bringing awareness to this but it needs to be changed and nerfed asap, I can't handle versing another Teemo Tristana botlane running double spooky ghosts, it's too horrifying.

Petition to have {{item:3023}} **nerfed**, thanks Riot, thank you so much.

**And before all you super low elo warriors comment, you must read this disclosure from a benevolent friend of mine;**
*Low elos should learn to stop back talking diamond 1s or higher. If someone from bronze has an opinion that differs from a diamond 1's, the bronzie should NOT try to reason with the high elo. He shouldn't ask why either. He should take what the diamond says as fact without talking back. Too many times, I've seen a bronzie backtalk a diamond 1, and it's disgusting, because the bronzie is wrong most of the time. The only time a bronzie is right is when 500,000 bronzies are talking back to a single diamond 1. There's a reason why you're stuck in bronze. It's because you think differently than the diamonds. Start thinking like a diamond.*

*God bless overlord Dynasty Ahri.* {{champion:103}}
